attributes.action: Allow legal asylum seekers to apply for ILR after 5 years in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Many legal asylum seekers have lived in the UK for years, contributing to communities and raising families while waiting for decisions. A 5-year settlement route would give fairness, stability, and dignity, reduce Home Office delays, and help integration into British society.
attributes.background: We ask the Government to create a 5-year ILR route for legal asylum seekers who entered the UK lawfully and have been living here legally while their asylum claims are pending.

rejection.details:
Keep the 5-Year ILR route for refugees. Do not extend it to 10 or 20 years
